metadata.Title: CVE-2015-3225 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low.
metadata.Description: lib/rack/utils.rb in Rack before 1.5.4 and 1.6.x before 1.6.2, as used with Ruby on Rails 3.x and 4.x and other products, allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (SystemStackError) via a request with a large parameter depth. It was discovered that Rack incorrectly handled certain inputs. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: ruby-rack: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
ruby-rack1.4: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
